item.title: Goldsvet en AlmaLinux VPS
item.description:
https://www.freelancer.com/projects/linux/Install-Custom-Goldsvet-AlmaLinux-VPS/details

I need an experienced professional to install a custom version of Goldsvet on my AlmaLinux 8 cPanel VPS server.

Key Tasks:

  • Install Goldsvet on a Linux server
  • Consult with me on potential modifications to the custom version

Ideal Skills:

  • Extensive experience with Goldsvet installation
  • Deep understanding of AlmaLinux and cPanel
  • Excellent communication skills for consultation
  • Strong problem-solving skills for addressing potential modifications

Please provide examples of similar projects you’ve completed in your proposal. I have a lot of scripts for the casino to install, there is a server there, almost everything is ready
